snippet: WEISS--Jean. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Jean Weiss, who leaves behind a loving family who will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish family life and values. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Jean's beloved children, Melvin (Bobbi) and Rita Fox (Martin); her grandchildren; her great-grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: WEISS--Jean. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Jean Weiss, who leaves behind a loving family who will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish family life and values. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Jean's beloved children, Melvin (Bobbi) and Rita Fox (Martin); her grandchildren; her great-grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
